titleStmt.title: SII 7.801: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 801. (A.R. No. 174 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṉṉivaḷara Irunila maṭan=taiyum poṟccayap pāvaiyuñ cirttaṉiccelviyu n=taṉ perunteviyarākiy Inpuṟu neṭutuyar Ūḻiyil liṭatuṟaināṭum tuṭarvaṉavelip paṭar vaṉavāciyum cuḷḷiccūḻ matiḷ koḷḷippākkaiyum naṇṇaṟkkarumuraṉ maṇṇaik=kakamum porukaṭal liḻattaraiyar tam muṭiyum Āṅkavar teviyar roṅkeḻil muṭiyum munṉa
varpak=kal tenṉavan vaitta cun=ta ramuṭiyum min=tiraṉāramun n=teṇṭirai yiḻamaṇṭala muḻuvatu meṟipaṭai keraḷan muṟaimaiyil cūṭuṅ kulataṉamākiya palar pukaḻ muṭiyum ceṅkatirmālaiyuñ caṅkatirvelait tolperuṅkāval pal paḻan=tivum ceruvil ciṉavil yirupattorukālaraicukaḷai kaṭṭa paracurāman melvaruñ cān=ti maṟṟivaraṇ karutiyirutti
ya cempoṟṟiruttakumuṭiyum payaṅkoṭu paḻimika muyaṅkiyil mutukiṭṭoḷitta cayaciṅkan ṉaḷapperumpukaḻoṭum piṭiya yilaṭṭapāṭi yeḻaraiyilak=kamum ṉavaṉetik=kulapperumalaikaḷum vik=kiramavira cak=karakoṭṭamum mutirpaṭavallai maturamaṇṭalamum kāmiṭavaḷa nāmaṇaikkoṇaiyum veñcilaivirar pañcappaḷḷiyum pācaṭaipaḻana mācuṇitecamum ĀAyiāvilva
ṇkirtti ṉakaravaiyil can=ti ran tolkulat tintirarataṉai viḷaiyamark=kaḷattu kiḷaiyoṭum piṭittu palataṉattoṭu niṟaikulataṉakkuvaiyumṅ kiṭṭaruñ ceṟimiḷai yoṭṭaviṣaiyamum śrīcurarcer nalkocalaināṭum tanmapālaṉai vemmuṉai yaḻittu vaḷai vaṇṭuṟaicolai taṇṭaputtiyum yiraṇacūraṉai muraṇuṟat tāk=ki tik=kaṉaikirt
ti takkaṇalāṭamum kovin=tacan=taṉ māviḻi n=toṭa taṅkātacāral vaṅkaāḷatecamum n=toṭukaṭal caṅkoṭṭalmayilpālaṉai veñcamar viḷākat tañcuvittaruḷi Oṇṭiṟal yāṉaiyum peṇṭirpaṇṭāramum ṉittilaneṭuṅkaṭal luttiralāṭa mum veṟimalart tirttat teṟipuṉal kaṅkaiyum Alaikaṭalnaṭuvuḷ palakalañ celutti caṅkarāmavijaiyottuṅkapanmamaṉṉākiya kiṭārattaraicaṉai vākaiyam po
rukaṭal kumpakkariyoṭu makappaṭut turimaiyil piṟakkiya perunetip piṟakkamum Ārttavaṉaṉakanakarp porttoḻil vācalil viccātirattoraṇamum mottoḻil puṉamaṇi putavamum kaṉamaṇi k=katavamum niṟai śrīvijaiyamum tuṟainirp paṉṉaiyum mvaṉmalaimuyūraieyiṟ ṟoṉmalaiyūrrum Aḻkaṭal lakaḻcūḻ māyiṉaruṭiṅkamum kalaṅkā valviṉai yilaṅkācokamum kāppuṟu
niṟaipuṉal māpappāḷamum kāvalampuricai mevilipaṅkamum viḷaippan=tūṟuṭai vaḷaippain=tūṟum kalaittakkoṟ pukaḻ talaittakkolamumt titamāvalviṉai mātamaliṅkamum kalāmurikkaṭun=tiṟal lilāmuritecamum teṉakkavārpoḻil māṉakkavāramum toṭukaṭaṟkkāvaṟ kaṭumuraḷ kaṭāramum māpporutaṇṭāṟk koṇṭa kopparakesaripanmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīrājendraco
ḻadevark=ku yāṇṭu 10 7Āvatu jeyaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu pavittiramāṇik=kavaḷanāṭṭu vākūrāṉa Aḻakiyacoḻacaturvvetimaṅkalattu Uṭaiyār śrīmūlastā ṉamuṭaiya mahādevaṟk=ku mahāsabhaiyom Innilam vaḻikkollainilam paṉṉiraṇṭu māvum Idevark=ku tiruppatiyam pāṭuvār nālvarkkum ḷuk=ku tirupparicaṭṭaṅkaḷuk=kum nivan=tamāvatākavum kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻaṉtirunan=tavāṉattilum śrī
madhurān=takaṉtirunan=tavānattilum Amutu pilā Oṉṟum Amutu mā Oṉṟum Amutu teṅku Oṉṟum pūmaraṅkaḷum nīṅkalāka niṉṟa māvum pilāvum teṅkum maṟṟum palamaraṅkaḷum Āṭu pattum piṭilikaivāri Araik=kālp poṉṉuk=ku kiḻppaṭṭa poṉṉum Ikkoyilil civabrāhmaṇarkaḷ kaiyuṟṟu tāṅkaḷ Anubhavittu Iccivabrāhma ṇarkaḷ can=tirātittavaṟ Erik=kakaṭava tirunon=tāviḷak=ku
muṉṟum nampirāṭṭiyār Arin=ta vaṉmahādeviyār peṇṭāṭṭi pūvaṉnaḻaku vaitta tirunon=tāviḷak=ku Oṉṟiṉā lāṭu toṇṇūṟum can=tirātittavaṟ panmahāyeśvara rakṣai . Immahādevaṟke Ivvūr melpiṭākai Aviyannūrṟceri Irukkum paḷḷi kecaṉ centan vaitta tirunan=tāviḷakku Arai .
Digital edition of SII 7.801 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
